name: Propulse
description:
Action Game Very Cool and Style

Z - Add propulsion

Left and right arrow keys - Change direction of propulsion

Avoid obstacles and get to the green goal area

Credits to:

Kenny for the background water tile:
https://www.patreon.com/kenney

Bluerobin2 for the character sprite:
https://opengameart.org/content/jetpack-robot

Snabisch for the music:
https://www.patreon.com/Snabisch

Miriam Espacio for the fire title screen
https://www.pexels.com/@miriamespacio

Made for Odd Weekend Jam 19
